contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 10, 1907 D Woodstock Agricultural and Horticultural Association Contest (Open Section)
Woodstock Contest (Open Section) 10 Test Piece Contest Woodstock Contest woodstock-contest-open-section
None
Gems of Song [arr. W. Rimmer]
Blenheim Park, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK 4 bands competed.
The 1908 Cornet annual records Mon 9th Sep, but a local newspaper report and an original winners certificate are both very clear that the date was Tue 10th Sep. The contest closed with the 6 bands present between the two sections performing massed and also each giving a selection on their own.
April 6, 2012, 6:07 p.m. June 18, 2017, 10:39 a.m.
1 Ilford Horns Temperance R. Wilson
2 Newbury Temperance J. S. Liddle
3 Kidlington Silver H. Taylor
4 Campden Town James Pyment
